0.title: The Greatest Christmas Blessing
0.plot: When a group of orphans become stranded in Hope Valley for Christmas, their caretakers lead Bill to investigate the circumstances of their arrival.

1.title: Phone Rings and Heartstrings
1.plot:

2.title: Episode #6.2
2.plot: Bill and Abigail are skeptical of Lucas, a newcomer to Hope Valley. Bill investigates the mystery man with some help from a spy at the town's new switchboard. At the schoolhouse, Elizabeth teaches one of her students to find his confidence. Intrigued by the stock market, Abigail solicits Gowen's investment help. Meanwhile Clara applies for a job at the saloon.

1.title: Lost and Found
1.plot: Coal Valley goes up in arms when a plank with a personal message is found in the rubble of the fatal coal mining accident.

2.title: Cease and Desist
2.plot: Abigail and the widowed wives receive notices from The Pacific Northwest Mining Company asking them to evict their company-owned homes within 14 days to make room for new miners.

3.title: A Telling Silence
3.plot: Elizabeth helps a mute student who is struggling to cope with the death of her father; Jack investigates the mysterious circumstances surrounding the burning of Coal Valley's only church.

4.title: Secrets and Lies
4.plot: After finding the cans of whale oil, Jack investigates Cat Montgomery for her possible involvement in the church arson case. When the evidence points to Cat, Gabe becomes infuriated by the idea of his mother being imprisoned for something she didn't do.

5.title: The Dance
5.plot: When a group of new male miners comes to Coal Valley, many of the town's women get caught up in the idea of the single men. One of the new miners begins courting Elizabeth and Jack seems to have concerns that resemble jealousy.

6.title: These Games
6.plot: The Miners' Games allow the townspeople to cut loose and have a little fun; Elizabeth and Billy Hamilton spend more time together; Jack investigates a series of robberies that are plaguing Coal Valley.

7.title: Second Chances
7.plot: Abigail must pay a steep price to complete a top-secret project she's been working on; one of Elizabeth's students has trouble reading so she enlists Jack's help for a creative solution; Abigail gives Jack some fine advice on a woman like Elizabeth.

8.title: Perils of the Soloists
8.plot: Elizabeth must put on the Coal Valley Founders' Day play on short notice; the only surviving miner from the explosion comes home from the hospital with a shocking surprise; Jack has a heart-to-heart with Adam in hopes of bringing them back together.

9.title: Change of Heart
9.plot: Jack properly asks Elizabeth for a dinner, but he is surprised by a reassignment.

10.title: Love Comes First
10.plot: Abigail does some detective work and learns more about Gowen's dangerous conduct leading up to the mine disaster; Julie Thatcher is becoming closer with Nathaniel when the rest of the Tolliver gang arrives in Coal Valley.

11.title: Rules of Engagement
11.plot: Jack is back in Coal Valley along with an unexpected visitor that threatens his and Elizabeth's relationship; Elizabeth receives some unforeseen news that will force her to make a very difficult decision.

12.title: Prelude to a Kiss
12.plot: Bill Avery continues his investigation into the mine explosion with help from Jack; a budding romance grows between Bill and Abigail; Elizabeth struggles to make a decision about the teaching offer.

1.title: Trials of the Heart
1.plot: Elizabeth and Jack's budding union barely has time to begin when Elizabeth receives a telegram requesting her return home; Abigail nervously awaits the mining disaster trial.

2.title: Heart and Soul
2.plot: Elizabeth and Jack remain worlds apart. Abigail learns the devastating truth about Bill Avery. A con artist arrives in town. Jack and the townspeople work on building the new school and church

3.title: Heart's Desire
3.plot: Abigail leaves the town to search for a family member. Rosemary gets her big break she's been waiting for, but things don't go the way she'd hoped. Jack is there to lend his help. A new pastor comes to town with unconventional preaching methods. Jack continues to work on building the new church for Elizabeth's return to teaching. The question is does Elizabeth want to return?

4.title: Awakenings & Revelations
4.plot: Bill returns to town on an undercover mission. Jack gets himself involved without knowing what the mission is. Rosemary doesn't feel her role in the town is big enough and seeks to have a theatre built. A childhood friend of Elizabeth comes to town on business and hopes it will allow him more time with her. Abigail seeks advice from the new preacher about a close family member of hers.

5.title: Heart of the Family
5.plot: Elizabeth returns to town in time for the school semester to begin. Elizabeth readjusts to country life in a big way, but has a helping hand from Jack. Abigail gets help in the Cafe from a family member. Rosemary finds a new way to contribute her knowledge to the townspeople. Gowen has met his match in a local tycoon. Bill busies himself in Hamilton with some shady business deals.

6.title: Coming Together, Coming Apart
6.plot: Jack and Elizabeth don't see eye to eye on everything in Hamilton. They discover that their relationship is not as straightforward as they originally thought. Elizabeth's family puts a strain on Jack, and it takes all of Jack's skills as a constable to resolve the conflict. Bill sorts out a relationship from his past, so that he can move forward with the future. Gowen's grasp on the town is threatened by a powerful member of the town. It all comes down to the luck of the draw.

7.title: With All My Heart
7.plot: The school term gets off to a cold start. Elizabeth gets called back to Hamilton to deal with a family emergency. Jack gets involved. Rosemary gives the school children some acting encouragement. Abigail moves forward with her life, and the café, apart from Bill. Elizabeth's family continues to question Jack's involvement in Elizabeth's life. Gowen's position of power in the town increases even more.

8.title: Heart and Home
8.plot: Elizabeth and Jack receive upsetting news from their families in Hamilton that could tear them apart. Meanwhile, Abigail tries to find forgiveness in her heart for Bill as Lee enlists Rosemary's help to fight Gowen and keep Hope Valley from falling apart.

9.title: Follow Your Heart
9.plot: Elizabeth and Jack return to Hope Valley on fragile terms. Bill arrives in Hope Valley and Nora follows soon after.

1.title: New Year's Wish
1.plot: A fresh start for Jack and Elizabeth, a surprise guest for Abigail, an adventure for Rosemary and Lee, an unwanted visitor from Pastor Hogan's past, and new beginnings for the town makes this the most unforgettable New Year's celebration Hope Valley has ever seen.

2.title: Troubled Hearts
2.plot: Elizabeth surprises Jack with a home of her own as Abigail learns of Gowen's latest greedy scheme and Frank's past quickly closes in on him.

3.title: A Time to Speak
3.plot: After the discovery that Frank is a wanted man, Hope Valley quickly turns on their pastor before Abigail sets out to prove that the mistakes of the past don't define the future.

4.title: Heart of a Hero
4.plot: After Hope Valley learns redemption is possible, Abigail and Frank pursue a romance before the heart of the town is tested by the threat of a gang of outlaws.

5.title: A Gentle Heart
5.plot: Jack and Elizabeth are stronger than ever - but as Faith prepares to make a permanent move to Hope Valley while leaning on Jack for emotional support, Elizabeth grows wary of their friendship.

6.title: Forever in My Heart
6.plot: As Jack prepares to take a big step toward building a life with Elizabeth, Abigail welcomes Becky back into her home before making an emotional decision about their future as a family.

7.title: Heartbreak
7.plot: Abigail is left reeling after the sudden arrival of the children's aunt and as she faces a heartbreaking goodbye, Elizabeth and the rest of Hope Valley come to witness a powerful act of love.

8.title: Hearts in Question
8.plot: Jack welcomes an unexpected visit from his mother Charlotte, while Elizabeth struggles to find common ground with her; Abigail and Frank make their courtship official; Rosemary begins planning her dream wedding to Lee.

9.title: Prayers from the Heart
9.plot: After a landslide puts one of Hope Valley's own in grave danger, the strength of a town is tested.

1.title: A When Calls the Heart Christmas
1.plot: An intriguing peddler comes to Hope Valley selling the townspeople his wears and teaching them valuable lessons about joy and giving.

2.title: Words from the Heart
2.plot: As Elizabeth and Jack coach the kids in baseball, Elizabeth struggles to help a young boy come to terms with an old injury.

3.title: Heart of Truth
3.plot: When Robert tells a lie about seeing a bear and becomes a town hero, Elizabeth has to coax the truth from him.

4.title: The Heart of the Community
4.plot: The town carnival is a chance for Elizabeth to raise money for the school and help a young boy connect with his father.

5.title: Change of Heart
5.plot: Elizabeth struggles with growing pains at the school, an old friend comes to visit Jack, Abigail's tenure as mayor is threatened, and Rosemary plays matchmaker.

6.title: Heart of a Teacher
6.plot: Elizabeth fights to clear her name and get her job back; Jack gets some troubling news; Wyatt and the railroad continue to make problems for Hope Valley; the children have to deal with a stern new schoolteacher.

7.title: My Heart Will Go On
7.plot: After the death of a friend, Jack makes some difficult life choices that may affect Elizabeth as well.

8.title: Healing Heart
8.plot: Elizabeth has problems in her classroom when the nephews of Ray Wyatt come to her class.

9.title: Courageous Hearts
9.plot: Tension between Elizabeth & her students continues. Meanwhile, Lee & Rosemary fight about Rosemary learning to drive; & Abigail struggles to hold the cafe together while the railroad's commissary thrives.

10.title: Heart of a Secret
10.plot: Elizabeth takes Opal in while her parents are away; a newcomer to Hope Valley has some insight into Carson Shepherd's mysterious past; an unlikely turn of events puts Cody in harm's way.

11.title: Heart of a Fighter
11.plot: Cody struggles with an illness while there are 2 differing opinions on the problem and Abigail decides who to believe. Gowen goes to jail for his past crimes.

0.title: The Christmas Wishing Tree
0.plot: The town has a new tradition to help make the wishes of the townspeople come true. Elizabeth works overtime to make one wish come true, while she waits for her own wishes to come true.

1.title: Believing
1.plot: Elizabeth's sister, Julie, visits Hope Valley in her quest to become a teacher; Lee is made acting Sheriff when Abigail and Bill leave town to testify in Gowen's trial; Carson has problems with a traveling tonic salesmen.

2.title: Hearts and Minds
2.plot: Elizabeth mentors Julie, who finds teaching more difficult than she imagined; Abigail has to find a way to convince the railroad to build its depot in Hope Valley.

3.title: Home Is Where The Heart Is
3.plot: Jack returns and he and Elizabeth start planning their future. Sparks fly between Carson and a new arrival. Elizabeth teaches her students the difference between facts and speculation, and the town is put on edge when Lee can't withdraw funds to pay his employees.

4.title: Open Hearts
4.plot: Abigail has to figure out how to keep the town's bank afloat. Meanwhile, Elizabeth struggles to understand what troubles one of her young students. Rosemary goes overboard planning Jack and Elizabeth's wedding.

5.title: My Heart Is Yours
5.plot: Jack and Elizabeth's plan to get married is put in serious jeopardy and Bill has difficulties transporting a prisoner.

6.title: Love And Marriage
6.plot: Jack and Elizabeth's relationship is put to the test. Pastor Frank and Abigail make a decision about their future and Bill helps a young girl solve a mystery.

7.title: Heart of the Matter
7.plot: Elizabeth assigns her students to follow business leaders in Hope Valley; Abigail and the town host two possible investors for the failing bank; and Bill's life is disrupted when AJ Foster arrives and turns herself in.

8.title: Weather the Storm
8.plot: Bill is put in jeopardy while transporting AJ to face trial; Abigail tries to save the town from an investor who will hurt Hope Valley; Carson is faced with a decision; Elizabeth tries to reunite a mother and her son.

9.title: In My Dreams
9.plot: The widow of Lee's former partner arrives and gives Gowen a chance to run a company again; Elizabeth tutors a new student; the residents of Hope Valley conspire to pull off a surprise.

10.title: Close To My Heart
10.plot: The people of Hope Valley unite to help one of their own deal with a crushing loss.

locations: CWSB, Langley, BC::(studio) (town set, church set, home set, mine set exterior and studio)
imdb.plot outline: Elizabeth Thatcher, a young woman from a wealthy family, moves to the small town of Coal Valley to be the new teacher. As she struggles to adapt to living on the western frontier, she makes new friends including the local Mounted Police Officer, Jack Thornton.
imdb.title: When Calls the Heart
plot: Elizabeth Thatcher, a young school teacher from a wealthy Eastern family, migrates from the big city to teach school in a small coal mining town in the west.::Executive Producer

Elizabeth Thatcher, a young woman from a wealthy family, moves to the small town of Coal Valley to be the new teacher. As she struggles to adapt to living on the western frontier, she makes new friends including the local Mounted Police Officer, Jack Thornton.
